section.name: Presentation
section.p:
Tapestry-Tldgen is a Maven plugin developed and updated by exanpe organization.
The purpose of this plugin is to generate a tld describing a Tapestry 5 components library.
This tld, once imported in your favorite IDE, will greatly help developers to code their tml pages and increase their productivity significantly.
The plugin uses both Javadoc and @Parameter annotation to perform the generation.
Please have a look to the Usage page to learn in 2 minutes how to setup and generate your tld !
